EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Lean+Leaders_Backers_2016.Reminder - Los Angeles
EmailTemplate.subject: See You Tomorrow at the Leader’s Guide Workshop!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Leader’s Guide Workshop taking place tomorrow in Los Angeles.
The Leader’s Guide To Adopting Lean Startup at Scale Saturday, July 16th, 2016 Registration @ 9:30am Sessions Start @ 10:00am Lunch will be provided Workshop Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/lean-workshops/backers/losangeles]]>
Location Pivotal Los Angeles <[[http://pivotal.io/locations/losangeles]]> 1333 2nd Street Suite 200 Santa Monica, CA 90401 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/1333+2nd+St+%23200,+Santa+Monica,+CA+90401/@34.0156623,-118.4995675,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x80c2a4cf8b433eb5:0x33b118d41ed3e74c!8m2!3d34.0156579!4d-118.4973788]]>
Parking
Please be advised that there may be extra traffic on 2nd Street due to the Saturday Farmer's Market; please allow for additional travel time. We recommend you park in one of the Santa Monica Public Parking Structures on 2nd Street. They are both open 24 hours and the full-day parking rate is $17.50:
Parking Lot: Structure #4 1321 2nd Street Santa Monica, CA 90401 *Adjacent to Pivotal
Parking Lot: Structure #2 1235 2nd Street Santa Monica, CA 90401
Building Access Starting at 9:15AM a company representative will be in front of our building to welcome you into the building. Please let them know you are attending the Leader's Guide Workshop and you will be directed to the second floor.
Questions? Contact us at leadersguide@pivotal.io <[[mailto:leadersguide@pivotal.io]]>
We look forward to seeing you there! The Pivotal Team
